snippet: Vacation time is here and Europe's politicians are packing their bags for a well-earned break. But with many Europeans forced to trim their budgets, this year the rule is: don't go far.
abstract: Vacation time is here and Europe's politicians are packing their bags for a well-earned break. But with many Europeans forced to trim their budgets, this year the rule is: don't go far.

headline.main: In an Ailing Continent, It's Staycation Time for Europe's Politicians
